thread.title: Akhil to do a Comedy Next?
thread.title_full: Akhil to do a Comedy Next?

title: Akhil to do a Comedy Next?
text:
Email 3 
Even as he awaits a high-profile launch to the Telugu film industry with VV Vinayak’s Akhil on October 23, sources indicate that the actor Akhil Akkineni’s second film will be an out-and-out comedy film with director Sreenu Vaitla. The younger son of Akkineni Nagarjuna, Akhil previously made a brief cameo in the 2014 blockbuster Manam, which turned out to be the last film of the legendary Akkineni Nageswara Rao. 
“After an intense action film, Akhil wanted to do a light-hearted entertainer. He is in talks with Srinu Vaitla and if all goes well, he will be seen in a comedy flick next year,” revealed a source close to actor. 
Meanwhile, the makers of his debut film Akhil are going all out to promote the movie and sources reveal that the Akkineni Akkineni song featuring the Akkineni trio of Nagarjuna, Naga Chaitanya and Akhil, promises to be an eye-feast for fans. 
Produced by Nithiin, the film features Sayesha Saigal as the female lead.
